category: Best Actor in a Leading Role

secondary.name: The Man with the Golden Arm

nominations.notes: This was the first posthumous acting nomination in Academy Awards history, although Jeanne Eagels was retroactively credited with a posthumous nomination for the 2nd Academy Awards in 1930, when no nominees were announced prior to the ceremony.

category: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role

nominations.notes: Anna Magnani was not present at the awards ceremony. Marisa Pavan accepted on her behalf.

category: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
